section.p: Content reuse is the use of a single piece of content in multiple location in a single document, or in multiple, related documents.
One example would be to use the same DITA topic in more than one map.
Another example would be to employ a conref to reuse a glossary or core vocabulary item in an "about" topic.
One of the major reasons users cite for moving to DITA is the ability to reuse content effectively.
